name: The Nation of Nuke
startIntroPart1: Have you always enjoyed standing in the middle of the world and nuking everyone?
startIntroPart2:
Well, you come to the right place... 

 (Author's words: Enabling the customized map and put more civs on the map for a better nuking experience!)
declaringWar: Taste the feeling of Nuke, HAHA.
introduction: I know you people can't find me, but you'll be nuked soon.
neutralHello: There is still work to be done.
hateHello: You're on my list of the nuking, so be careful~
